original: Löf, Ernst Josef, positmästare, Växjö f. 19/7/87 i Helgum, Västern. 1., av kyrkoh. Abraham L. o. Emma Axellina Bergius. G. 1. m. Sigrid Johanna Öman; 2. m. Hulda Ingeborg Olsson, f. Haglund. Barn: Ernst Börje f. 17, Karin Elisabet 19, Inga Brita 22, Kurt Filip 24, styvdtr Ingrid Margareta f. 18. — Genomg. 6 kl. v. Härnösands h. a. 1., postkurs 07, adm. kurs 34. E. o. postexp. 07, postassist. 2S, förste postassist. 30, postmast, i Kopparberg 35, kontr. i Linköp. 39, postmäst. i Ange 42, i Uddevalla 4’6, i Växjö fr. 47. Led. av örnsköldsviks tax:nd 23-30, rev. av kyrk. o. skol. rä-kensk. i Örnsköldsvik 29-30, siffer-gransk. h. Göteborgssystemet där 25 -30. Hobbies: friluftsliv, jakt o. fiske. GM.
translated: Löf, Ernst Josef, postmaster, Växjö, born on July 19, 1887 in Helgum, Västernorrland. Son of the vicar Abraham L. and Emma Axellina Bergius. Married 1st to Sigrid Johanna Öman; 2nd to Hulda Ingeborg Olsson, born Haglund. Children: Ernst Börje born in 1917, Karin Elisabet in 1919, Inga Brita in 1922, Kurt Filip in 1924, stepdaughter Ingrid Margareta born in 1918. Completed 6th grade at Härnösands higher elementary school, post course in 1907, administrative course in 1934. Temporary post clerk in 1907, post assistant from 1920, first post assistant in 1930, postmaster in Kopparberg in 1935, controller in Linköping in 1939, postmaster in Ange in 1942, in Uddevalla in 1946, in Växjö from 1947. Member of the Örnsköldsvik tax board from 1923-1930, reviewer of church and school accounts in Örnsköldsvik from 1929-1930, auditor of the Göteborg system of number checking from 1925-1930. Hobbies: outdoor life, hunting, and fishing.
